entry.title: eJPT Notes [Arijit Bhowmick][sys41x4]
entry.summary: Enumeration IP check Check your connected interfaces and IPs Use ip addr to get the list of interfaces and their ips Route Get Network/s of IP-Address to test View the network to test using route Only display the required Network to test route | grep tap0 | cut -d " " -f 1 Add a network to routing table sudo ip route add 192.168.222.0/24 via 10.175.34.1 grep Command grep command i...
